description: This is an HTML source file for the front-end of a database visualizer web application. It defines the structure, styling, and client-side logic for browsing databases, tables, and viewing data.
external_methods: fetchData (fetch API calls to backend endpoints)

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases by re-fetching data from the server.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database entry to show its tables, and initiates table loading.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data from a selected table and renders it in a table format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for displaying table data, handling wide content and object cells.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual table cell content, with support for nulls, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for lengthy strings or objects.
